game.name: CELESTE Classic
game.desc: CELESTE Classic is the first entry in the Celeste series, made for a 2015 game jam. Its success spurred the launch of the series. Help Madeline climb the terrifying mt. Celeste, with the help of her unreasonably swift dash!

game.name: CELESTE Classic 2
game.desc: CELESTE Classic 2 is a promotional sequel to CELESTE Classic, released on CELESTE (the full game)'s third anniversary. Journey across the mountain as Lani, Madeline's friend who owns a grappling hook!

game.name: Just One Boss
game.desc: Just One Boss is a fun and challenging game, consisting of one (charming?) boss for you to face off against!

game.name: CMY Platonic Solids
game.desc: CMY Platonic Solids is a fun demo of the rendering capabilities that PICO-8 can offer.
